attributes.action: change the price of school uniforms
attributes.additional_details: because the amount of families that cannot afford uniform then turn to the under class and this could lead to depression or illegal activities as many wont have a job because they have no GCSES and thefore many people arnt able to pay taxes and are forced into poverty and are forced to live on the street.
attributes.background:
however, i do understand that this is not your department but i feel you should get local authorities to tell business to reduce prices as there are many student out of education due to not being able to provide uniforms 

this is also part of a project we need to do for school

rejection.details:
The price of school uniforms is a matter for private retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Require schools to make uniform optional': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259

'Ban school uniforms in English schools': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158
